meanings.definition: To post a message on Twitter.
meanings.sent1: She tweeted about her new blog post.
meanings.sent2: He tweeted a funny meme yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The cat tweeted a meow for all to see.
meanings.sent4: His words tweeted like birds flying into the digital sky.
meanings.sent5: The tweet echoed through the online world like a digital song.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she tweeted a picture of her dog.
meanings.sent2: He tweeted his thoughts on the movie he watched.
meanings.sent3: The tree tweeted its age in rings for all to read.
meanings.sent4: His laughter tweeted through the room like a joyful melody.
meanings.sent5: The news of the victory tweeted across the town like a happy dance.
